description: Adds a linked server to the Redis cache (requires Premium SKU).

name.description: The name of the Redis cache.

linked_server_name.description: The name of the linked server that is being added to the Redis cache.

parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Create Linked server operation.

subscription_id.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

properties.description: Properties required to create a linked server.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group.
